metadata.synopsis: Arka has just killed Sazza with her crossbow. Reaction of the party.Requires 2 characters.Speaker 1 is the character who let Arka do the deed through the dialog, as such their reply should keep that in mind.Speaker 2 is a nearby companion who instigates the PAD and can have an opinionated line.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Sloppily done. But I guess the goblin had it coming.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Won't shed tears over a goblin, but still - not a pretty scene.
